Table of Contents

MultipageHtml5Converter Sample

  • About This Sample
  • Custom Level Part

This sample document attempts to showcase the features of the MultipageHtml5Converter extension. The output can be generated from the current directory with asciidoctor -r ../asciidoctor-multipage.rb -b multipage_html5 sample.adoc.

These three paragraphs are in the "preamble" area (the first has the lead attribute). This content belongs to the root-level node and is written to the main output file (sample.html, by default).

This paragraph has a titled inline anchor with id [[root-inline]]. It is linked from More Cross-References.

  • About This Sample – Explains how this sample document is processed

  • Custom Level Part – Shows a custom multipage-level value and additional features
